FuncDef: The reset msdp all-instance sa-cache command clears (S, G) entries in the source active (SA) cache in all-instances. The reset msdp all-instance sa-cache command clears (S, G) entries in the source active (SA) cache in all-instances.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the group address carried in (S, G) information.
The value ranges from 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255, in dotted decimal notation. If this parameter is not specified, all (S, G) information in the SA cache is cleared.

ExtraInfo: When you want to clear (S, G) information from an SA cache, run the reset msdp all-instance sa-cache command.
